sentences.en: ...a theme that was to recur frequently in his work.
sentences.cn: …一个将在他的作品中多次出现的主题。

sentences.en: Crowd mentality changes slowly, and price patterns recur, albeit with variations.
sentences.cn: 大众的智力变化慢, 价格的模式会反复出现, 但有所不同.

sentences.en: Does history / the past repeat itself? ie Do similar events or situations recur?
sentences.cn: 历史[过去的事件]还会重演 吗 ?(类似的事情或情况还会发生 吗 ?)
经济危机周期性地发生.

sentences.en: He did not recur in thought to New York or the flat.
sentences.cn: 他再也没去想纽约或者他的公寓.

sentences.en: I shall recur to the subject later on.
sentences.cn: 我稍后再回头谈这个问题.

sentences.en: I will recur to the history of this bridge later.
sentences.cn: 我待会将会提到这座桥的历史.

sentences.en: Let us recur to the principles which we have worked out.
sentences.cn: 让我们重提之前提出的原则.

sentences.en: Love is a recurring theme in the book.
sentences.cn: 爱情是这本书中反复出现的主题。

sentences.en: Of course, many problems recur at various periods.
sentences.cn: 当然, 有许多问题会在不同的时期反复提出.

sentences.en: The army will recur to the use of force.
The path of a planet appears to consist of loops that recur regularly.
sentences.cn: 行星的轨迹呈现出规律重复的环形.

sentences.en: The same old favorites recur year in year out with monotonous regularity.
sentences.cn: 相同的决心以单调的规律年复一年地出现.

sentences.en: The same old favourites recur year in year out with monotonous regularity.
sentences.cn: 一些相同的老嗜好年复一年地以单调的规律重现.

sentences.en: There is a danger that the disease may recur.
They usually disappear over several weeks and do not recur.
sentences.cn: 结节常在数周后自然消退,复发不常见.

sentences.en: This source of doubt would not so perpetually recur.
sentences.cn: 此种疑团,当不会如此长久存在.

words.tran_cn: 复发的；周期性的，经常发生的
再发生；循环；重现；重新提起

trans.tran_cn: 复发；重现；采用；再来；循环；递归
trans.tran_en: if a number or numbers after a  decimal point  recur, they are repeated for ever in the same order
if something, especially something bad or unpleasant, recurs, it happens again
